All that was sent in the video Frank, was a pretty song. sf
 
 
In a messag=
e dated 12/23/2010 10:13:39 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
purplealiengirl@g=
mail.com writes:

 
 
 
I know ya think everyone should believe, and I get =
the Jesus  voices, too, 
I just don't buy it. The concept of not believing =
in a savior and  being 
either forever dead or condemned to hell just don't=
 make any sense. EVP,  and 
just about everything paranormal proves that li=
fe is forever, no strings  
attached. I don't care how much they sugar coat=
 the stuff, it's still giving  
your soul, spirit.--freedom, to some unkonw=
n entity, and that ain't good.  
Everyone I know, with out exceptiion the w=
as "born again" became someone else, 
 someone evil that would back stab fr=
einds and family for the slightest 
gain.  Lie cheat and steal. What about =
all the really evil, vile televangelists 
out  there? Preaching hell's fire=
 during the day, chasing little boys and 
doing  drugs at night. Try doing =
some reverse speech on these freaks! We  
have one of those evil clowns rig=
ht here in Colorado. Why don't your Jesus  
keep evil away for these little=
 megolomainiacs? That's cuz he is that which  
you fear in the ultimate dig=
uise! Think about it, call the being from the  
white light evil and lure a=
ll others into darkness. It's not rocket  science!
 
 I have to side with H=
ultay, go make yourself a group just for true  
believers. 
 
 Freedom of r=
eligion is by definition freedom from religion! 
 
F-S
